mapper.select: select * from tms_attachements order by createdTime desc
mapper.insert: insert into tms_attachements (id,title,fileName,contentType, filePath,fileDisgest,athType, belongId,createdTime,modifiedTime, createdUser,modifiedUser) values( #{id},#{title},#{fileName},#{contentType}, #{filePath},#{fileDisgest},#{athType}, #{belongId},#{createdTime},#{modifiedTime}, #{createdUser},#{modifiedUser})
